channel.title: Music – Roger Miller
channel.description: Recent content in Roger Miller on Music

item.title: Roger Miller - King Of The Road
item.description:
작사: Roger Miller
KY: 61677 / KY: 7620

Trailer for
sale or rent
Rooms to
let fifty cents
No phone no pool
no pets
Ain’t got
no cigarettes
Ah but two hours
of push and broom
Buys a eight by
twelve four bit room
I am a man of
means by no means
King of
the road
Third box car
midnight train
Destination
banger maine
Old warn out
suit and shoes
I don’t pay
no union dues
I smoke old stoggies
I have found
Short but not
too big around
I am a man of
means by no means
King of
the road
Three engineers
on every train
All of their
chewing
all of
their names
And every handout
in every town
And every lock
that ain’t locked
When no ones
around I sing
Trailer for
sale or rent
Rooms to let
fifty cents
No phone
no pool no pets
Ain’t got
no cigarettes
Ah but two hours
of push and broom
Buys a eight by
twelve four bit room
I am a man of
means by no means
King of
the road
Trailer for
sale or rent
Rooms to let
fifty cents
No phone
no pool no pets
Ain’t got
no cigarettes
Ah but two hours
of push and broom
Buys a eight by
twelve four bit room
